class.name: tidyup_state_creators/goal_creator_reset_world
class.description: Resets the world interface, deleting all known objects from the environment server.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/goal_creator_tidyup_initialize
class.description: Loads manipulation locations from a config file for static objects and doors and assigns them to their respective rooms.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/goal_creator_load_tables_into_planning_scene
class.description: Load the tables from tables.dat file and add them as collision objects into the planning scene.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/goal_creator_from_planning_scene
class.description: Asks the environment server for known collision objects and adds them to the initial state.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/goal_creator_move_objects_to_table
class.description: Sets goal condition to move all objects to a certain table.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/state_creator_robot_pose
class.description: Sets the current robot pose in the state and possible at-style predicates.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/state_creator_object_reachable
class.description: Estimates whether objects are in reach of the robot, when standing at specific locations.

class.name: tidyup_state_creators/state_creator_from_planning_scene
class.description: Asks the environment server for known collision objects and adds them to the current state.
